title: The Pontiff, the Paraclete, and the POTUS - Julian and Paul Fahey offer a defense of Pope Francis
description:
Julian has a talk with Catholic author and catechist Paul Fahey about Pope Francis and how he is viewed by Catholics today, the Catholic teaching on the purpose of the Pope, and what the Pontiff of 2020 has in common with the POTUS of 2020.

Follow Paul's work here:
https://wherepeteris.com/author/paul-fahey/
https://www.hprweb.com/2020/07/i-will-give-you-a-new-heart/

Follow Julian's work here:
https://coffeewithkierkgaard.home.blog/
